name: Name
onboard_first_page_phrase: The application was made to help small farmers to increase their profit margins and facilitate the dissemination of its products, connecting directly with the consumer and facilitate the dissemination of its products, connecting directly with the consumer.
onboard_second_page_phrase: Producers will be able to see what potential buyers are looking for and users will be able to find products near them.
onboard_third_page_phrase: The price history system provides a way for the user to evaluate their purchases The average price can help the producer control his prices, using general prices.
